42: כֹּל֩ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>Whatever</n> הוֹלֵ֨ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Whatsoever goeth</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> גָּח֜וֹן <sup>1512 </sup> <n>upon the belly</n> וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and whatever</n> הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and whatsoever goeth</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> אַרְבַּ֗ע <sup>702 </sup> <n>upon [all] four</n> עַ֚ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>whatever</n> מַרְבֵּ֣ה <sup>7235 </sup> <n>or whatsoever hath more</n> רַגְלַ֔יִם <sup>7272 </sup> <n>feet</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to every</n> הַשֶּׁ֖רֶץ <sup>8318 </sup> <n>among all creeping things</n> הַשֹּׁרֵ֣ץ <sup>8317 </sup> <n>that creep</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הָאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>upon the earth</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תֹאכְל֖וּם <sup>398 </sup> <n>them ye shall not eat</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> שֶׁ֥קֶץ <sup>8263 </sup> <n>for they [are] an abomination</n> הֵֽם׃ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>do</n>
43: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תְּשַׁקְּצוּ֙ <sup>8262 </sup> <n>abominable</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נַפְשֹׁ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>5315 </sup> <n>yourselves</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> הַשֶּׁ֖רֶץ <sup>8318 </sup> <n>with any creeping thing</n> הַשֹּׁרֵ֑ץ <sup>8317 </sup> <n>that creepeth</n> וְלֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תִֽטַּמְּאוּ֙ <sup>2930 </sup> <n>with them that ye should be defiled</n> בָּהֶ֔ם וְנִטְמֵתֶ֖ם <sup>2933 </sup> <n>neither shall ye make yourselves unclean</n> בָּֽם׃
44: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> יְהוָה֮ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>For I [am] the LORD</n> אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֒ <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> וְהִתְקַדִּשְׁתֶּם֙ <sup>6942 </sup> <n>ye shall therefore sanctify yourselves</n> וִהְיִיתֶ֣ם <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> קְדֹשִׁ֔ים <sup>6918 </sup> <n>and ye shall be holy</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> קָד֖וֹשׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>for I [am] holy</n> אָ֑נִי <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> וְלֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תְטַמְּאוּ֙ <sup>2930 </sup> <n>neither shall ye defile</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נַפְשֹׁ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>5315 </sup> <n>yourselves</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> הַשֶּׁ֖רֶץ <sup>8318 </sup> <n>with any manner of creeping thing</n> הָרֹמֵ֥שׂ <sup>7430 </sup> <n>that creepeth</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>upon the earth</n>
45: כִּ֣י ׀ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>For I [am] the LORD</n> הַֽמַּעֲלֶ֤ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>that bringeth</n> אֶתְכֶם֙ <sup>853 </sup> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>you up out of the land</n> מִצְרַ֔יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> לִהְיֹ֥ת <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לָכֶ֖ם לֵאלֹהִ֑ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>to be your God</n> וִהְיִיתֶ֣ם <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> קְדֹשִׁ֔ים <sup>6918 </sup> <n>ye shall therefore be holy</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> קָד֖וֹשׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>for I [am] holy</n> אָֽנִי׃ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n>
46: זֹ֣את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> תּוֹרַ֤ת <sup>8451 </sup> <n>This [is] the law</n> הַבְּהֵמָה֙ <sup>929 </sup> <n>of the beasts</n> וְהָע֔וֹף <sup>5775 </sup> <n>and of the fowl</n> וְכֹל֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and every</n> נֶ֣פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>creature</n> הַֽחַיָּ֔ה <sup>2416 </sup> <n>and of every living</n> הָרֹמֶ֖שֶׂת <sup>7430 </sup> <n>that moveth</n> בַּמָּ֑יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>in the waters</n> וּלְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and everything</n> נֶ֖פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>and of every creature</n> הַשֹּׁרֶ֥צֶת <sup>8317 </sup> <n>that creepeth</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>upon the earth</n>
47: לְהַבְדִּ֕יל <sup>914 </sup> <n>To make a difference</n> בֵּ֥ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> הַטָּמֵ֖א <sup>2931 </sup> <n>between the unclean</n> וּבֵ֣ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>and between</n> הַטָּהֹ֑ר <sup>2889 </sup> <n>and the clean</n> וּבֵ֤ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> הַֽחַיָּה֙ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>and between the beast</n> הַֽנֶּאֱכֶ֔לֶת <sup>398 </sup> <n>that may be eaten</n> וּבֵין֙ <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> הַֽחַיָּ֔ה <sup>2416 </sup> <n>and the beast</n> אֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> תֵאָכֵֽל׃ <sup>398 </sup> <n>that may not be eaten</n> פ
